description: Solve hundreds of fun and challenging puzzles in this original turn-based puzzle game. Hide from your enemies or lure them into traps, press buttons to open up new paths or skip obstacles using the teleporter!

name: Snakenpon
description: The classic Snake game is back merged with the Jankenpon game! A relaxing casual game where you eat the fruits and needs be aware of the symbols: if you are rock, paper will make you grow 3 times longer the default.

name: Floor 13: Deep State
description: Floor 13: Deep State is a dynamically generated dystopian thriller, inspired by the 90’s classic Floor 13 and created by its original team. In a free society, citizens make their own decisions, can challenge authority, and are able to speak their truth. Your job is to put a stop to that.

name: 3D Hentai Puzzle
description: 2 games in one - classic puzzle, where you need to put all the fragments of image in the right places and the game "40 numbers", in which you need to guess a random number between 0 and 40. And as a reward you will receive nude images.

name: The Legend of Arcadieu 2
description: A sexy RPG adventure in a magical world filled with beautiful girls! Part two!

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Falling Stone
description: AboutThe alien creatures that hunt you down have finally caught your trap and hit them hard with the rocks you've prepared. Be careful not to fall into the trap yourself, it's hopeless.FeatureThe DLC include full 10 missions

name: System Control
description: System control is a submarine combat simulator featuring an analog control design. A strange anomaly has manifested deep in the ocean, and your government has tasked you with taking their fastest sub and making contact.

name: The Schizophrenic Dynasty of Müller
description: In this visual novel you're a voice in schizophrenic heads of dynasty Müller. You pass from generation to generation and you control your schizophrenic, talking sometimes with him. The important thing is, you shouldn't let your schizophrenic die without offspring, otherwise you'll die with him.

name: Freddy Spaghetti 2
description: Freddy 2.0 is here! Freddy is spaghetti. Oh, and conscious. Freddy 2.0 has got a job! The story starts as you plunge headfirst into the workplace. Overcome the environment, master your spaghetti and run to the coffee machine! Don’t be late on your first day! Freddy Spaghetti uses rope physics to simulate a squishy, stretchy, ropey character.

name: Sakura Succubus 3
description: Ogasawara Hiroki was a normal man until he, by chance, learns that many members of Japan’s elite are actually succubi. And, what’s more, there’s something about his scent which makes them attracted to him. Now an encounter with a woman from his past can change everything. This woman introduces herself as Yue, the succubus queen. She intends to whisk Hiroki away to the succubus realm to keep him for her own. Trapped with Yue, Hiroki is faced with an ultimatum: will he succumb to her advances, or will he try to escape?

name: The Crystal Golem
description:
The Crystal Golem is a short but hard action game, inspired by Dark Souls and playing old games without a manual.

Will you be able to destroy the corruption from the Void and restore Humankind?

name: Pillars on Poppy Hills
description: Pillars on Poppy Hills is a visual novel about wanting to become something or nothing.

name: Virtual Ricochet
description: “Death-defying tennis with robots and laser guns!” Virtual Ricochet is built from the ground up as a fusion of the best of VR shooters and tennis-style mechanics in a retro-futuristic synthwave arena - IN SPACE!

name: Close Contact
description: Close Contact is a short, narrative-driven, sci-fi horror game where you must navigate an advanced underground base whilst avoiding the alien creature that stalks you.

name: Election 2020: Battle for the Throne
description: Fight in the most anticipated battle of the 21st century!

name: Asteroad
description: It's the story of a girl in the world anyone can transform into a constellation. With meteor showere, the girl's favorite "star" has fallen apart. The girl collects pieces of star to return the star to the night sky.

name: MechaHead League
description:
Welcome to the Mecha Head League, the Feast of Endless Strategies! 
Conquer the League with Various Mecha Head Characters! 
Lead the Corps with Super Mecha Head to Snatch the Victory! 
 
Brawl Against 2048 Challengers with the Best You Have! 
The League Conqueror will be Qualified for Taking Down the Evil Forces and Take the Glory! 
Sweep the Evil-beings and Save the Kingdom! Precious Treasures are Waiting for You, Commander!

name: It's Six Random Characters and a Single Floor Dungeon: That's the Whole Game
description: 'It's Six Random Characters and a Single Floor Dungeon, That's the Whole Game' is a first person dungeon crawler. You start with a team of 6 random characters, and try to make your way through a single labyrinth. Each character has a Class and Race that influence them at the start, and you can find things along the way as you try and reach the exit. There are 105 classes and 28 races, but only 4 races per class for a total of 420 characters.

name: Hazel the Plant Witch
description:
A kind and cosy game about listening to others. 
 
People say talking to plants helps them grow. Hazel knows better. Most plants can't understand human speech. Luckily, Hazel is a brilliant techno witch who has made a gadget that will help her communicate to plants! By listening to plants, Hazel can record what plants are saying to her. This way, she can replay that dialogue to other plants and have a real conversation with a plant in their own language! 
 
Can Hazel overcome the limitations of speaking in pre-recorded messages and help her plant friends out?

name: Block Wizard
description: Block Wizard in an arcade puzzle game that features 100 levels. Use your character's unique abilities to manipulate the environment and solve mind-bending puzzles! What's the fastest you can climb?

name: The Wizard and The Slug
description: When a fugitive wizard meets a forest slug, a strange friendship is born. Together they traverse an oddball fantasy world, unraveling the mystery surrounding an ancient curse. Play as the fastest, most agile slug in video game history together with your spellcasting wizard companion. It's a team-up you never knew you wanted. Strong focus on humor, character interactions and story.

name: Up on the Rooftop
description: Santa's elves have revolted! Christmas is falling apart, but reindeer are on the case! Knock sense into the elves and ensure Santa can make his delivery on time! Avoid Bears! Make deliveries along the way! They must save Christmas; they will save Christmas!

name: Aegis Online
description: Aegis Online is the virtual tabletop for all your game night needs. For classic role playing games, traditional wargaming, and more! Aegis Online has the tools to bring your friends to the table even when they can't be in the room.

name: My Young Boyfriend Part 1
description: In this interactive Romance Otome Game, the one in control of the romantic story is you! You have multiple option as to how the story will go.

name: Big Tall Small
description: Big Tall Small is an adventure puzzle platformer game that was developed by rob1221 and released on November 1, 2020. It can be found on many websites stuch as Newgrounds and Coolmath games.

name: Princess Peach Sex Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: Wormwood: Expanded Universe
description: A sequel to 2019's Wormwood, Expanded Universe is another Halloween-themed collaboration between Grain of Salt and Ribbiks

name: Ar Luminae
description: Ar Luminae is a single-level PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port that was released in November 2020. It was designed by Aurelius and Kaito and uses several music tracks: "Wolverine" and "Atomic" by James Paddock (Jimmy), "Fission Dance" by Brayden Hart (AD_79), and a MIDI rendition of "Gerudo Valley" from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It received one of the 2020 Cacowards. The map integrates the gameplay changes of the Supercharge mod.

name: Fallen London: Older, Not Wiser
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2020.

name: Super Disc Box
description: The exact midpoint between Super Crate Box and Disc Room, a zippy little score attack challenge built for the Disc Room game jam.

name: Gigycube
description: Gigycube is a mobile Hyper Casual Puzzle game focused on rolling a cube to pop all the colors in infinite procedurally generated levels. Simple yet interesting gameplay combined with satisfying sound effects makes a perfect mind improving and calming game.

name: 魔物警戒
description: Sin descripción

name: Book of Shadows
description: The story will tell you about a dark wizard who spent his entire life hunting for the book of shadows and one day accidentally finds out where it is stored. The book is hidden deep in the library and is inaccessible to the dark forces.

name: Elroi: Defense War
description:
Go on an adventurous expedition to pioneer a new continent. Pioneer a new continent by fostering your characters and executing various strategies.

Summon your characters with a simple touch, defeat monsters, and destroy enemy towers to discover amazing artifacts.
Collect artifacts to grow your team, and hire and nurture powerful heroes and master characters.

name: Blocks Stacking
description: Casual/puzzle game where the goal is to get as high as possible placing blocks on top of each other. Controlled by keyboard and mouse or gamepad. 4 difficulty levels make sure that anyone can play it, and for reaching certain goals you will be given cosmetic rewards.

name: Prizefighters 2
description: A retro inspired boxing game with customizable leagues and multiple career modes. Climb ranks as an amateur to become the Greatest, sign fighters and manage your own gym, or be the promoter and run your own tournaments.

name: MiniStrike
description: A shoot’em up game with bite-size levels.

name: Nilia
description:
Select your character and explore all the levels.

From dungeons to mines a passage through hell to freezing ice mountains, you will face lots of dangers to reach the final fortress.

Don't forget to collect the more gems you can!
Use them to level up your character and learn spells.

name: The Last Chronomancer
description:
A Retro Style RPG that involves 6 main character classes, multiple story paths, multiple endings, turn based combat, exploration, and an epic sized story filled with twists and turns.

Embark as 'The Last Chronomancer', and guide the 6 heroes towards the moment of destiny, where The World's fate hangs in the balance.

name: Last Hope on Earth
description: In Last Hope on Earth you will find several game mechanics in the style Open World Survival Craft and much more, such as: creation and construction of bases, search for items, collection of resources, PvP in open world, PvE against various monsters and animals, cooperation and a lot of fight for survival!

name: Smash Monkeys
description: Run through amazing worlds and compete with other players in this epic game for mobile and tablet platforms. Choose your favourite Smasher, get the weapons you need to annoy your rivals and get to the finish line first!

name: Temple of the Lizardmen 5
description:
What does Temple of the Lizard Men 5 bring to the series?

- Larger and more complex maps.
- Two hub maps allowing the player to choose which level they want to play first and in whatever order they want.
- At the end of each map, there is a puzzle item the player will pick up and use within the hub levels.
- Less arsenal that requires reloading (More runnin' n gunnin'!).
- Smaller wad/pk3 file size.
- Expands compatibility from GZDoom 1.8.2 to the current version of GZDoom.
- Compatible with Zandronum 3.0
- Compatible with LZDoom

name: Fantasy Fight Live!
description:
Fantasy Fight Live! is an overlay game utilizing a browser source where viewers can join random duels or challenge each other while watching you stream.
Viewer-Controlled heroes will appear on the stream (configurable by the streamer) and fight each other until a winner is clear. The players can level up and collect items to create and customize their very own hero or they simply use a pre-created default hero.

name: Wawary
description: A simple rythm game for everyone where you collect blue blobs to gain points.

name: Mr. Krabs Overdoses on Ketamine
description: Play as Mr. Krabs in this all new action packed platformer. You will fight tooth and nail in order to make ends meet for your crippling ketamine addiction.

name: Sketchy.Academy
description:
Sketchy is a free web-based multiplayer game.
Each players make drawings that are passed and guessed from player to player, chinese whispers style.
At the end you get to see they've become: hearty laughs are guaranteed!

name: C.H.A.I.N.
description:
20 games, 20 developers, one narrative...

Haunted PS1 Presents: C.H.A.I.N.

The chain is an exquisite-corpse collection of 20 short horror games developed over the span of half a year.

The developers couldn't communicate with each other during development. Each developer would send their game to the next person in line, who would make a follow-up. Together they form a complete narrative.

name: Astrogon
description:
Jump and dash your way, between walls and obstacles to reach the teleport portal.
Get precise and strategic, or die.

Catch the right orb: Touch the red orb and become red, and you will touch red walls safely. Same thing for the blue. Touch the green orb to ‘extra jump’, you will jump to the next step. Touch the yellow orb to dash, and fly down, on the side or up to the sky.
Try to conquer level after level, dimension after dimension, with patience, dexterity, and intelligence. Earn rare Skins with amazing auras and special effects: blazes, ghosts, clones, laser turbine, etc!

Astrogon allows you to create your own levels in the Creative Mode. Become the God of Astrogon, be smart, innovative and clever, challenge all Astrogon players to succeed and beat time records and collect stars.
Players from all over the world will access your creations and play the levels you invented.

Beat other players in real time in the multiplayer mode.
Challenge your friend, or play against another player from all over the world.
Perfect for intense live streaming sessions.
Get ranked and be the best.

name: The Dealer
description: The Dealer is a dialogue driven game that takes place in the fictional version of the United States, set against catastrophic economic and political situation. You play as a street dealer in the most troubled city of the country. To survive, you have to sell everything you can get and face hard moral decisions.

name: Superior Wizards
description: Explore the world in the adventure of a young wizard roaming the world learning new spells and helping those in need. Learn to cast spells to defeat your enemies, resolve conflict and go places few people have gone.

name: Community Build Project 9: Halloween-2020
description: A community map that is similar to an episode, separated by portals.

name: The Last Dimension
description:
You find a key to change your dimension. The infinite curiosity of mankind drives you to a decision: to reach the last dimension.
Do not touch the fractals or stay in the black void to reach higher dimensions! Each level has its own endless fractals, so what are you waiting for?
Please make sure not to reveal any personal information in the weekly leaderboard.
Warning: The Last Dimension's colorful effects may cause epilepsy.

name: Yandere no Sutoka
description: Yandere no Sutoka is a spin-off game by YandereDev and AMZE. The game is a parody of Saiko no Sutoka, a game by Habupain.

name: The Hunter's Journals: Red Ripper
description: A diplomatic mission...with a lethal twist!

name: Travel Mosaics 13: Spectacular Amsterdam
description: Travel Mosaics 13 - Spectacular Amsterdam takes you to beautiful Holland for a relaxing Puzzle vacation! Stroll through the picturesque city and take in the gorgeous sights. There's plenty of see and discover, including fun trivia as you play!

name: MP2: Wooded Land
description: Sin descripción

name: MP2: Lava Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Candles of the Damned
description: Remake of E1M2 from Quake: a medium-sized medieval castle with many candles. The map was previously released as part of Halloween Jam 2. Among other things, this version features even more candles! Comes with a new bat model and some ambient sounds.
There is no information on the last entry of C.H.A.I.N..

name: Abraxas
description:
Link #19 in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is purported to mirror an unknown apocalypse-esque event and its cover art supposedly has an intoxicating effect on some who witness it.

Now there is nothing more to do. I must do what I promised my father.

name: Scary Library
description: C.H.A.I.N. link #18 revolves around a librarian in her workplace during a torrential thunderstorm. The specimen can purportedly possess people.

name: Vale
description: Link #17. In a unique departure from most other case reports, this one is entirely in Japanese and its subject follows an unknown protagonist in a dark forest.
Appropriately titled 16, this C.H.A.I.N. link may or may not be linked to an incident of occult Welsh origin.

name: Specimen 15
description: Mysterious disembodied eyes chase you in this link of Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N..

name: Specimen #14
description: Yet another untitled entry in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N., it follows an unknown protagonist hounded by mysterious, eyeball-like creatures.

name: Column Dodger
description: For the 13th link in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is a simple dodging game. Nearby metal objects are purported to migrate by a couple inches if the game is left on for a certain duration.

name: Avert Your Eyes
description: Link #12 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. is footage from a hiking trip in west Germany. The video quality is abhorrent for what should be a modern phone and the device itself is caked in ashes.

name: Day 11
description: The 11th link in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. is extremely anomalous and is known to cause psychosis and paranoia among the staff who play it or otherwise come in contact with it. They are typically then reported either missing or dead. There is no known way to handle this game safely.

name: Organ of Eden
description: The tenth entry within Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is preceded by a report of a parasitic mind virus and a biostratigraphic diagram. A medical team surrounds the player as gore begins to pile around them.

name: Swell
description: Link #9 of Haunted PS1'S C.H.A.I.N. initially resembles a PSX disc, but is revealed in the research log to be some form of potentially living creature. What follows is only explainable on those terms.

name: Specimen #08
description: The untitled eighth game in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. takes place in an unknown, blood-soaked location. The only new detail given on the research log is an ultrasound image of an unknown figure.

name: Ball Out
description: Link 7 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. provides souls in balls for the player to rebirth. The research log indicates that the physical properties of the disc may not be completely inert.

name: Dream Aether
description:
Dive deeper and deeper into dreams in this short musical experience.

This is link 6 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N..

name: Drip
description: The fifth link in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology is a lovecraftian arcade platformer under the water.

name: Emerge
description: The fourth link in the C.H.A.I.N. anthology is a mysterious exploration game. Its case report has a mysterious (now dried) liquid on top of a mostly illegible synopsis.

name: The Participants
description: The third game in the HauntedPS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology, it documents a nightmare-like trawl through a surrealist underwater world.

name: Ms. Blanch,
description: The second game in the HauntedPS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology, it follows the interactions of a Ms. Blanch and a man who attempts to drive her into the ocean.

name: Torch
description: The first game in the HauntedPS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology, it follows a young woman exploring a cave with not but a singular torch. Its case report details a labyrinth of walls and pathways in Utah, first recorded on the 25th of August, 1997.

name: Casio Mario World
description: An extremely hard hack.

name: Witches X Warlocks: Lawrence's Route
description:
This optional DLC comes with 40+ mini CG illustrations, one additional romance route (Lawrence) and 5 additional CGs in stunning HD.

Time to enhance the game with these eye candies and have a spooktacular Halloween with Witches x Warlocks!

name: Get the Heck Out
description: Shoot your way through 100 levels of this roguelite bullet hell. Start weak, get powerups, become OP.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword Randomizer
description: A randomizer for the game The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword.

name: Deviant Anomalies
description: Deviant Anomalies is an adult visual novel and investigator simulator. It features High quality renders with fully animated lewd scenes and immersive gameplay. Solve baffling cases, recruit Supernatural Anomalies into your team and help them control their newfound powers. The more uninhibited their minds are, the more their powers grow.

name: Black Eyes
description:
Black Eyes is a atmospheric VHS aesthetic styled horror title inspired by the urban legend of black eyed kids and inspired by the title Among The Sleep.

A short horror game for the Halloween season made in a few days!

One late evening you awake from a nightmare about a girl with black eyes, suddenly reality shifts and contorts and you feel something sinister trying to get in your room. You must now prevent whatever it is from trying to get in, while also finding a way out of your room and help get to your sisters room before it's too late.

name: Eyad and Hala
description: A short visual novel about life in Hamburg. Eyad and Hala are two Palestinians living in Wilhelmsburg. They find unexpected support from an Irish-run café.

name: Pongs
description: Pongs with extra steps

name: Astrid & the Witch
description: After Astrid gets sent into a different dimension by her secretly-a-thousand-year-old-skeleton neighbor, she has to find her way back home while encountering strange creatures and sort-of-human people along the way.

name: God Opens the Door
description: God Opens the Door is a short horror game where you flush your mom down the toilet.

name: Room Room
description: The game controls are pretty simple, but I'll tell you a secret to reward your interest: holding certain buttons will do something useful, specially for speedruning.

name: Dances and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Punch the Potus
description: Punch the Potus every time he says something stupid!

name: Little Fire Girl
description: Relaxing puzzle games to keep you in a good mood

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Elevators War
description: AboutAs a big thief, your goal is to steal the building. Dive into the building, eliminate all security guards, and open all the red doors to get your terrierFeatureThe DLC include full 10 missions

name: Orlando the Fireman
description: Orlando the Fireman is a really simple game where you play as the title character trying to save as many lives you can from burning buildings. A game about real-world heroes with a style inspired by our favorite 80s character.

name: Chaos
description: A dark-fantasy style Action RPG set in a third person view. Wield melee and magic abilities to defeat the enemies in the world and conquer the looming and impending evil.

name: LA Monsters
description: Travel through the LA wasteland with Josh and Sid in this atmospheric interactive video novel.

name: Bubble Gun 3D
description: The most unique, addicting and satisfying shooting game so far!

name: Above the Stars
description: Discover new worlds and build up mighty defences as you find your new home Above the Stars!

name: Creature Romances: For the Ladies
description: An original mystery horror love story! This work contains many disturbing, grotesque images and images of non-human creatures. Please be aware of this if you decide to buy this game.

name: Witches X Warlocks
description: Witches x Warlocks is a cute and light-hearted Halloween Raising Sim Visual Novel; featuring a customizable protagonist and 4 love interests of different genders!

name: Golden Rays of Sunshine
description: A small game about remembering.

name: High Stakes
description:
Las Vegas 2024. Vampires have stolen your blood. Play the card game of your life and win it all back.

This game was created as part of the A Game By Its Cover Jam 2020. The goal was to create a game based on of the cartridge covers from the Famicase Exhibition 2020. The cover to High Stakes was created by Tyler Q Anderson and Jamie C Lee.

name: Went.ai
description:
A new, free and original abstract strategy game.

Chess-like, Go-like.

Two players put move on the board for create a path from their king to the throne. But be careful, avoid the trap on your way...

name: Sleep When I'm Dead
description: Sleep When I'm Dead is a survival horror twin stick shooter with a distinctive art style.

name: Silver Night's Crusaders
description: Silver Night's Crusaders is a fan made Castlevania 2D action platformer featuring three playable characters and a high level of difficulty

name: Skelets
description: skelets is a local multiplayer skeleton brawler. Plunder gems as you fight other skeletons. Use different weapons to dig into the terrain and collect your treasure. First to steal all the diamonds wins!

name: Haunted Cities Volume 4
description: A collection of four short games originally released via Kitty Horrorshow's Patreon.

name: Dark Day Afternoon
description:
Dark Day Afternoon is a third person horror-survival game inspired by old style playstation horror games, designed to keep you on the edge of your seat every second of its gameplay. 
 
Three self made scientists, researching on a way to transform human DNA structure, find themselves in a sea of troubles when one of the "subjects", decides to "escape", and in doing so, kills everyone. 
 
YOU ARE A COURIER WHO RECENTLY RECEIVED A SUSPICIOUS PACKAGE TO BE SENT TO A REMOTE LOCATION... 
 
BUT WHEN YOU ARRIVE, THINGS TAKE A TURN FOR WORSE!

name: Fetch Quest
description:
A game about being a dog, playing fetch, and rescuing your best friend. Climb a cursed tower as quickly as you can, otherwise something terrible will happen.

A challenging platformer game with an emphasis on speedrunning. Enjoy this free action/horror hybrid adventure!

name: Smiley's Revenge
description: In a post apocalyptic world, it is up to you and your allies to restore order to the world to defeat Dr. Smiley.

name: Eonica Chess Battle
description:
Inspired by the popular Dota 2 Auto Chess game mode, Eonica Chess Battle is an auto-battler game, mixing together elements of the classic chess game with elements from the fantasy fiction world. The game features 8 players competing against each other in an exciting last man standing duel.

The ultimate goal: carefully engage chess pieces in strong combinations and optimal arrangement on the board to successfully encounter the opponent formations. Mastering the mechanics and synergies governing chess pieces, understanding the probabilities of getting certain pieces and carefully following the in-game economy are some of the key skills required, in order to adopt a successful strategy.

The result: a fun and entertaining game, which can be enjoyed together with friends.

name: Seven Wonders of St. Clementine
description: In pursuit of a cause dear to him, Mizukami Sei heads to a new school; but from the beginning, everything seems off, and the intense folklore pervading the surrounding hasn't helped. What dark secrets lurk in St. Clementine's shadows?

name: Otaku's Adventure: The World Just Keeps Turning
description:
Will the earth be destroyed soon?
Will you choose only one between the earth and Waifu?
This DLC, player will travel through time and space via a time machine, meet all kinds of different people, find clues and growth, and find ways to save Waifu and the earth.
This DLC content is a continuation of the Waifu's story of the main game.
Complete the entire story of the Waifu.

name: Hamster Tycoon: Cake Maker
description:
You became the owner of the Cake making shop.
Are you ready to play cake making games with levels?
Improve your cake factory and hire hamster managers.
Create the most delicious cake in this cake making games.

name: Youmenkiden
description: A side-scrolling action platformer in the style of NES/Famicom games. Play as high school student Zankirou Tougi as he is whisked away into a world where he must do battle against fearsome youkai.

name: Magical Kiss
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Our 30-Minute Sessions
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Dead or Delivery
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: ISEPS Idle Particle Simulator
description: Create beautiful particle systems with tons of colors, patterns, and attributes and see them grow and move around in real-time!

name: Pokémon Factory Adventure
description:
A hack based on Roaming Red by TShadowKnight

The year is 199X. Several months after becoming champion of the Kanto Region, Red is called back by Blue to help on a secret mystery-solving mission! In Red's absence the Kanto region has been overtaken by a strange mist that mutates Pokemon into shocking new forms, and the military has instated a lockdown! Are you a bad enough detective to discover the origin of the mutations and save Kanto?

This hack is based on a fansite from the late 90s called The Pokemon Factory". On it, fans would email in their ideas for new Pokemon to the site's artists who would make sprites and Pokedex entries of them to be displayed. These Pokedex mockups have made the rounds on the internet in the years since, with some even gaining notoriety as "Pokegods".

name: Not All There
description:
After working overtime one evening, you go to the underground parking lot to search for your car, you notice it's nowhere to be found. The parking lot is completely empty except for one car driving around in circles. A sinister feeling that something bad is going to happen overwhelms you as you continue to search for your car.
Will you make it out alive or should you have stayed at work?

name: Honey Select 2: Libido DX
description: The ultimate sex simulator is here! Honey Select 2: Libido Deluxe is a love letter to making love. Engage with high-quality, fully-customizable characters in every imaginable situation. From romantic candlelight sex to the most specific kinks, Honey Select is sure to satisfy you!

name: Club Suicide
description: Club Suicide is an anti-romanticism otome game developed by Morpath for PC. There are 20 endings in this game, and players' choices throughout the game will alter the ending of the game.

name: GZ P.T.
description:
GZ PT is a standalone non-profit GZDOOM based remake of Hideo Kojima's Playable Teaser. While not a 1:1 remake, every sequence has been recreated as close as possible to the original, with low res assets and textures in true retro fashion.
Will you manage to escape the haunted corridor?

This game is completely standalone, only GZDOOM is required to play!

name: Coriander and the Fall of Orion
description: A tiny 3D adventure game where you talk to others and cut down trees.

name: Cyberhold
description:
In the year 2306, a massive meteor is set to collide with Earth, wiping out life as we know it. TYPHON, an aeronautical mining project has been assigned to deter the meteor away from Earth, but only to find out that it’s a vessel for cybernetic activity.

Cyberhold is a turn-based first person dungeon crawler, with very basic Soulsborne elements.

name: Dream Wires
description: Dream Wires is a collaborated English Yume Nikki fangame created by sniperbob and Madoreptilian in RPG Maker 2003. The game stars Shigeru.

name: Red-Handed Robin
description: A fantasy otome about lying and stealing.

name: A Final Delivery
description: Take a package to a disused cemetary

name: After School: A Vocaloid RPG
description:
After School-A Vocaloid RPG is a survival-horror Vocaloid RPG experience created using RPG Maker VX Ace. Playing as Oliver, you find yourself in a "Spirit World," an alternate dimension hosted by a single corrupted spirit. You meet new characters, and help spirits along the way while keeping an eye out for the corrupted host spirit. The player must help Oliver escape this world safely, while navigating the dangers it throws his way.

Heavy inspiration was taken from games such as End Roll and Ib, while the initial inspiration to start this project was taken from the song "Crushed Mary" by Mondaiji-P.

name: Griddlers Ted and Pet
description: Can the handsome scientist Ted and his clever robot P.E.T. uncover the mysteries of the past? Can you?

name: Reality
description: The city where everything is possible, but where it could also be true!

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope & Man of Medan Bundle
description:
The Dark Pictures Anthology is a series of intense, branching cinematic horror games featuring single and multiplayer modes.

Each story can be played independently.

This Bundle gives you access to Man of Medan and its supernatural horror in the south pacific, and Little Hope, where 4 college students and their professor must escape nightmarish apparitions whilst trapped in an abandoned town.

name: Qbio
description: This is a very cute real-time economic strategy game. Grow plants, level up, unlock new buildings.

name: Magic Cat Academy 2
description:
They're baaack!

This Halloween, we’re picking up right where our 2016 Magic Cat Academy Doodle left off with a subaquatic shriek-quel! Dive in with Momo the cat to help new friends and reach new depths in her adventure against the Big Boss ghost and its school of ghouls...underwater.

Feline lucky? Swim and swipe to PURR-tect the ocean and its creatures before it’s too late!

name: Murder Hornets
description: Kill wasp or wasp kill you

name: The Tool
description: Relaxing casual puzzle game. Create your own combinations of physical world objects, watch and run physical simulations, create new messages and share your creations with other players. Receive packages from the cloud and unpack it.

name: Siren Head: Awakening
description: Siren Head: Awakening is a first-person horror game based on Trevor Henderson's artwork. You're stuck with your car in the middle of a dark forest with nothing but your flashlight. Seek escape by finding items necessary to survive while a terrifying monster lurks the shadows.

name: Hentai Nureta Puzzle Power Girls
description: Relaxing game with nice music, puzzle, and beautiful anime girls. Discover all the pictures and find out what they hide ?!

name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour Africa
description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Africa is a puzzle game and adventure into the heart of Africa in 500 high-quality images.

name: Hentai Nureta Puzzle College
description: Relaxing game with nice music, puzzle, and beautiful anime girls. Discover all the pictures and find out what they hide ?!

name: Fishing Together
description: Are you bored at home during the epidemic? As the United Kingdom and the EU have just introduced bans on gatherings of more than 6 people, in such cases, how can we play with friends? We still need to be social however, and we need entertainments for ourselves too.

name: Flap Demon
description: A difficult precision platformer where your only form of movement is flapping.

name: 'Member the Alamo?
description: 'Member the Alamo? is a comedy shooter loosely based on the historic battle that birthed Texas. You will fight alongside larger than life heroes as you defend the Alamo from Santa Anna and his Mexican army that outnumber you 100 to 1.

name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Halloween Night
description: Bright and cozy fully customizable Halloween Jigsaws

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Bubble Gun
description: AboutYou've mastered the power of space bubbles and turned them into a weapon and ammunition; it can create a reverse push in space so you can hunt for treasure on top of magma. Find all the treasures.FeatureThe DLC include full 10 missions

name: Killer Inside Us
description: This game is available to play online with your friends (4-10 people). Inside the station there are killers and crewmates. The job of the killers is to kill the crewmates and don't get caught. They also can sabotage the station by disturbing the work of the space station.

name: Mr. Hibbl
description: Jump, dodge, collect! There is a lot of action waiting for you in this entertaining platformer!

name: 天仙变
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirate Jigsaw
description: Want a romantic sea cruise or a real pirate adventure? You can find it all in 500 photos in the new Pirate Jigsaw!

name: Ghosty
description: Ghosty is a lighthearted top-down action-adventure RPG that features tons of puns, witty dialogue, charming story elements, and a pixelized art style. The game experiments with a splash of unique mechanics that are used both in and out of combat.

name: Roce's Journey
description: Roce's Journey is a game based on the Sokoban, with 20 different puzzles and 100 levels. Players need to understand the characteristics of each mechanism and interact to solve the puzzle.

name: End Reach
description: End Reach is a roguelike top-down shooter inspired by the brutal gore of Hotline Miami and the heart pounding action of Nuclear Throne.

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Cinderella
description: Meet a real prince! Help Cinderella get to the ball! Solve enchanted puzzles!

name: Understand
description: Understand is an experimental puzzle game about guessing rules. In each level, you have to figure out the rules through trial and error, then draw a line satisfying all rules.

name: NoSeq
description:
You ever had dreams but never kept a dream diary? Me neither!

This game is a throwback to dreaming and not having your cake, don't remember anything? No worries, you'll forget everything after today too!

This game is basically a simulation on what a dream could hypothetically be. What is a dream? What is a nightmare? What is your mind that causes you to have a weird dream that doesn't make sense? Are we guilty? Are we innocent?

name: Surfacing
description: Surfacing is a Game Boy-style RPG in terms of color depth and screen size. Just pretend the resolution never changes due to text boxes, menus, or combat.

name: Miray
description: It's a rhythm game inspired by the Reflection. The ball will bounce slope to slope, You should press any key when the ball hits the slope.

name: Flea!
description: Flea is a challenging platformer with an intriguing back story. Play as Henry the Hyperactive Flea who just can’t stop jumping! Navigate the beast and collect blood to get the the heart of the problems.

name: White Day VR: The Courage Test
description: The Notorious cult-classic Korean horror White Day returns with a unique VR experience! Step into the eerie darkness of classroom 1-1 and earn your place in the Occult Club by braving the horrors within. Will you survive the courage test?

name: Touhou Gensokyo Visitor
description: Walking through the forest, Reimu meets a stranger in the forest, now she needs to understand where he came from, and how he got through the barrier.

name: Sloth Tales
description: "It's called Sloth Tales and it's about Jimmy's search for his biological father. Quite frankly it's brilliant." – Wordsworth the Panda.

name: Lakeview Cabin 2
description: The ultimate 2D horror is back! Dive deep into the diverse world of horror movies! Nothing can prepare you for the R-rated challenges you will face!

name: Paranormal Enteties
description: This game was created in 10 days for the 2020 Scream Jam. All training and assets for this game were provided through the GameDevHQ Pro Membership. If you have ever wished to tell a story through video games, then stop by GameDevHQ.com and start your career as a video game developer.

name: Don't Die! Douche!
description: Charge your way through 5 fever-dream induced worlds, dodging a plethora of bizarre dangers on your way. And remember: Don't Die! Douche!

name: Slither Loop
description: Slither Loop - draw lines between the dots to form a single loop without crossings or branches. The numbers indicate how many lines surround it. - 90 challenging puzzles, Easy/Medium/Hard difficulties - Beautiful abstract artstyle - Chill background music

name: Extortion
description: You're a computer engineer with a terrible secret. Someone is blackmailing you and now, you have to hack some servers and get secret files for him. Would you succeed to achieve his missions or would you find him and revenge ?

name: DodgeSaw
description: DodgeSaw is a 3D-ish dodgeball bullet hell which rewards you for being risky.

name: Defense War: Destiny Child
description:
Welcome to the devil frenzy! Duke it out on the battlefield along with characters from Destiny Child! Choose your strategy wisely!

Compete with players from all over the word and move up in the arena. Go for the top in the Demon Colosseum League. Play with friends or clan members.

name: Ascent of Titan
description: Ascent of Titan is a Doom 2 episode written in one month for NaNoWADMo 2020! It was brought together from scraps from various submissions to community projects that never made it, restyled into a classic techbase-styled episode with a modern spin.

name: Topography
description: A Bitsy game about online friendships, the golden age of tumblr, closeness and closure.

name: Doll Eye: Chapter 1
description: Doll Eye is a dialogue based, story-driven psychological horror game made on RPG Maker MV that focuses on TWISTED-DOCTOR's Original Characters. The first chapter of the game came out on 30th October 2020.

name: Cube Raiders
description:
Cube Raiders is a fun puzzle game for one or two players where you have to combine groups of dice using the energy of MagnetoGloves to solve puzzles.

Join Rose and Kirk in this head-breaking Cube Adventure and prove that you are a true Cube Raider.

name: Axes
description: Ready to take down all your enemies? Prepare your weapons and join Axes — an epic battle royale! It's an action-packed game where you prove that you can really rumble on the battlefield! Enter the arena and try to be the last one standing. Battle to survive using different weapons: axes, swords, shurikens and many more. Let the great scuffle begin!

name: Crypt Stalker
description: Whip your way through nostalgia fuelled kinky demon slaying. From hidden desert temples to floating ruins, this will take you back to the golden days of gaming, where there was only 4 buttons on a controller and VHS ruled the world.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Volume 1 - Limited Edition
description:
Box contents:
- Xbox Game: The Dark Pictures - Little Hope
- Xbox Game: The Dark Pictures - Man of Medan
- Dark Pictures Cloth Map
- Map Pins
- Steelcase

name: CyberTaxi
description: CyberTaxi is an action-packed driving first-person shooter and taxi simulator set in a grim vision of the future. You play as a cab driver who works in a dark-noir Hindenburg city and strives to escape this hellish location.

name: South of the Circle
description: South of the Circle is an emotional narrative experience exploring the relationship between Peter and Clara, Cambridge academics caught up in the political conflict of the Cold War. The story focuses on the weight of life choices - between career, true love and the desire to keep our promises.

name: Thunderballs VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Demonizer
description:
The fantasy bullet battle to end monstergirl genocide! Turn hateful humans into lovable demons in this 90s arcade style shooter, inspired by Raiden Fighters, Strikers 1945, and Battle Garegga.

The exiled princess Amelia has turned into a succubus and joined the peaceful monstergirl tribe. Then invaders arrive led by her sister Angelina. Fighting back with her newfound powers of hypnosis and demonization she departs to take on the kingdom in a desperate bid to save her new people.

Seven challenging hand-crafted levels packed with beautiful pixel art - defend your forest, fight through towns, break monstergirls out of dungeons, race against cavalry and more

Battle fearsome enemy forces - masses of infantry and artillery, nimble swordsmen and assassins, tricky spellcasters and mighty magical constructs

Capture their souls - transform them into fellow demons and watch their powers grow with yours

Simple game systems reward natural and intuitive play - stay alive, shoot and bomb, and the rest will follow

Three difficulty levels - beginners, enthusiasts, and experts can all enjoy

Rock out to a gritty, stompy YM2612 FM synth soundtrack

Rich retro visual customization - portrait or landscape, low or high res, smooth or sharp pixels, stretch or no stretch

A twist on the old monster-slaying story - includes free digital comic book revealing events before the game

name: Arcanbreak
description: A short story-driven game about two inquisitors, Arun and Quila, investigating a murder. During the game you'll control both, each having their own set of skills you'll need to solve the mystery.

name: Illness in the East
description: Adventure RPG with horror elements and a touch of Eastern European history and mythology. The story of two girls who had a hard time of General illness.

name: Eterna: Heroes Fall
description: Eterna: Heroes Fall is a true Old-School Turn-Based Tactical RPG featuring a storyline spanning generations, with multiple protagonists, a world filled with magic, glory, and ancient evil. Establish a bloodline of Heroes chosen by the gods to save the continent of Centura from an ancient evil.

name: My Very Own Light
description: Amnesiac with a lantern containing the right part of your brain, escape from the strange realm you’re trapped in. Solve its numerous puzzles and overcome its creatures by cunning and observation while discovering its intriguing hosts.

name: Star Drift Evolution
description: Star Drift Evolution is a minimalistic racing game about taking corners the most fun way possible: by powersliding! Race on a wide variety of stylized tracks, ranging from simple dirt ovals to challenging rally tracks and perfect your lines. Will you evolve to become a true Drift King?

name: Shut In
description: Shut In is a short comedy/horror adventure game which explores depression and isolation by trapping you inside your own house.

name: Tin Can
description: You've barely managed to flee your exploding spaceship. Now in an old escape pod, you find yourself in the shoes of a technician, without any knowledge of the complex systems, around you, that are keeping you alive. Faced with all kind of cosmic dangers, how long will you survive?

name: MonsterSoft
description:
Manage a game-dev company where your only employees are skillful monsters in this turn-based game. Destroy humans in your free time.

Synopsis:
MonsterSoft is a game development company that hires only monsters. After personnel reduction, the new CEO appears with a goal to create the game that will knock off the competition. The problem is that he has no idea how to make it... .

No one said that game creation is an easy task, so hire new employees, kill humans that will appear on your path, and survive in the harsh world of monsters. Your final deadline is B3 Conference in the next few months, so no pressure.

Characters:
Choose your dream team from a wide variety of monsters: zombies, vampires, werewolves, ghosts, etc. Each of them has a unique skill-set to kill humans efficiently, scare them off, or follow them till they die from exhaustion.

Multiplayer:
Invade humans residences with other monsters and check who will get the title of the Employee of the month. Plan your actions carefully and kill humans faster than your coworkers in this rat race. Monster association forbids fights between monsters, but who said that you can't do it indirectly?

name: Bean Climb
description: Simple yet fun parkour game. You're a bean trying to conquer the world and get to the top. Get to what? Nobody knows...

name: Mad Rat Dead
description: You've got one day to live and a big score to settle in Mad Rat Dead! Combining elements of action platformers and rhythm games with a cartoon-meets-punk art style, this crazy caper has you guiding a newly-resurrected rat in his quest for vengeance. Move in time with the music, smash through hordes of enemies, and rewind to escape hairy situations!

name: Starlight Shores
description: Wish on shooting stars while you enjoy a weekend getaway at the beach!

name: Adam: Robot World
description: It's a construction management game with path planning as the core architecture. I made this game in last two years. In the game, you will manage Adam and a group of robotic companions, seeking survival in a world without human beings, and confronting powerful Justicar.

name: Haunted: Poppy's Nightmare
description: I am Poppy - and this is my first Halloween.

name: Potion Paws
description: You’ve decided to take the risk and purchase a run down house in the middle of a spooky forest near a dungeon overrun with monsters.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope
description: Trapped and isolated in the abandoned town of Little Hope, 4 college students and their teacher must escape the nightmarish apparitions that relentlessly pursue them through an impenetrable fog.

name: Depixtion: Halloween
description: Depixtion: Halloween is a chilling expansion for the puzzle game Depixtion, in which you create grotesque works of art using logic. Based on the popular Picross series, Depixtion: Halloween blends color mixing mechanics with the rules of nonograms to create a uniquely colorful, and horrifying experience.

name: Sector's Edge
description: Sector's Edge is a fast-paced destructive voxel-based first person shooter in which two teams of 8 fight for zone domination across various planets.

name: Siege Machines Builder
description: Check yourself out as a builder of siege machines. Get raw materials, craft parts, build siege machines and test them.

name: Thunderballs
description: High in the clouds, a storm is brewing. Join the mayhem with up to 4 players in this tactical VR action game. Obliterate your foes with futuristic weapons and bring their base down around them with old fashioned artillery!

name: Today is my Birthday
description: Today is my Birthday offers a classic horror experience for fans of the genre, thrusting players into insurmountable odds with only a few tools at their disposal to escape death. Your own survival instincts, problem solving skills, and willingness to explore will shape your fate.

name: The Missing Few
description:
11 years after the disappearance of his son, Jack Norwood is brought back to the rural town of Staten. A call from an old friend Scott Clarke lead detective on your son's case brings you back home. As Jack follows the trail to unearth the truth, he might find out things have never been what they appeared in Staten. 
 
Search the enigmatic rural town of Staten to learn the truth and find out who or what is behind the mystery.

name: Legends of Ethernal
description: "Legends of Ethernal" is a 2D single-player action adventure game where you need to explore beautiful hand-crafted environments, solve clever puzzles and battle tough creatures to uncover the truth about your parents’ disappearance.

name: Dead Estate Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: First Blood
description: A set of 14 Boom-compatible maps designed for pistolstart. The difficulty starts off like Episode 1 of Doom 1, then ramps up to some Plutonia / late TNT difficulty near the end.

name: The Jingol
description: The teachings of his excellency: Jingol.

name: Awe
description: Your feelings and logic are very important in this game. Feel like a detective in a strange and extremely dangerous place. Investigate the loss of people, simultaneously solving puzzles and trying not to fall into the trap.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Rhythms of Neon
description:
Version 4.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Taixuan Dream arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie Augment Core: Fervent Tempo Δ (Rozaliya)
• New ELF: Tesla ZERO
• New Story Chapter XX: Immortal Phoenix
• New Featured Event: Honkai Quest
• ...and more!

name: Night, Hood and the Mysterious Traveller
description: The game follows a girl named Dust as she is sent on a quest to bring bread and pie to a nearby village by the name of Woodpine. On the way she meets a charismatic young traveler who offers to aid her on her journey. When they arrive to the village they quickly discover that the village is not as peaceful as it seems. Young children have gone missing in the village, one after the another, during the last few months and as a result the village is in disarray. Will Dust with the help of her newfound friend, solve the enigma surrounding the missing children or will the dark secret of the village of Woodpine be left forever shrouded in mystery?

name: G-Mode Archives 22: Heracles no Eikou III - Kamigami no Chinmoku
description:
"Glory of Heracles" is an RPG based on Greek mythology.
Since the release of the first work "Tojin Makyoden: The Glory of Heracles" in 1987, it is a popular RPG series that has spun stories with a number of hardware, and this work is the best scenario and famous title in the series.

The story is independent of other series works, and you can enjoy it alone.

In a world where day and night change with the passage of time, the people and shops you can meet will change.

While confronting strong enemies while making full use of 7 kinds of characteristic weapons and magic learned in temples in various places, in battles with weak enemies, the characters will fight automatically battle only with striking attacks by switching to auto battle mode, so it's stressful. You can play without it.

name: When Day Breaks
description: "When Day Breaks" is a short SOMA mod that aims to turn S. D. Locke's Proposal from the SCP Foundation Wiki into a playable story, featuring the key events, and some additional ones, with my own interpretation on the environments.

name: Par 1 Golf 5
description: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 5! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The fifth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Blair Witch: Oculus Quest Edition
description: Blair Witch: Oculus Quest Edition is a story-driven psychological horror game based on the cinematic lore of Blair Witch. As Ellis, a former police officer with a troubled past, join the search for a missing boy in the iconic Black Hills Forest near Burkittsville, Maryland.

name: The Candyman
description: The Candyman is a short horror retro PS1 style video-game, where you explore an abandoned manor during Halloween night. What secrets will you find inside, and what or who lurks in the dark?
